    "name": "Primes of the form n*2^(n-1)+1.",
    "comment": [
        "Generated by n = 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, 14, 27, 66, 67, 87, 115, ..  = A029544(n)+1.",
        "See also A236752 for primes of the form k*2^(k-1) - 1, and A230769 for the corresponding indices k (minus 1). - _M. F. Hasler_, Mar 01 2014"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(PARI) lista(nn) = {for (n=1, nn, if (isprime(p = n*2^(n-1)+1), print1(p, \", \")););} \\\\ _Michel Marcus_, Nov 09 2013"
    ],

        "Cf. A005183."
